articles.title: Huawei Mate 40 Pro September 2022 EMUI patch is expanding - HC Newsroom
articles.description: Huawei Mate 40 Pro global users were concerned about the September 2022 EMUI patch for the device, which had already been available to Middle East users. Now, the update is expanding for West Europe and France users. Notably, every new firmware update of Huaw…
articles.content: Launched in October 2018, Huawei Mate 20 series comprises Huawei Mate 20, Mate 20 Pro, Mate 20 RS Porsche Design, Mate 20 X 4G, and Mate 20 X 5G smartphones. The Huawei Mate 20 series is powered by K… [+20381 chars]

articles.title: Singapore's GIC to take majority stake in luxury Sani/Ikos resorts - Financial Times
articles.description: Sovereign fund flies in face of economic storms with biggest deal in European hotel sector since pandemic
articles.content: Singaporean sovereign wealth fund GIC has agreed to buy a majority stake in Mediterranean luxury resort operator Sani/Ikos Group in a buyout that values the company at 2.3bn, the biggest deal in the … [+3093 chars]

articles.title: Gillian Chung was detained at airport in Germany because she's too pretty - The Star Online
articles.description: Apparently, the authority thought the singer-actress was entering Europe to do “illegal things”.
articles.content:
It seems being too pretty is a crime after all.
